Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: GettoLoser
Reviews.Content: Took it overseas, does what its suppose 2 do.. Just a basic phone.. I needed to dial,,and receive calls...Charge lasted for maybe 9-10 hours with regular use. I charged the phone every night i went to sleep.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Caliban
Reviews.Content: I have T-Mobile and my sim works perfect with the phone. Excellent value for a compact and light-weight phone. It's also pretty easy to use. My only complaint is the call volume, the max volume is a bit low for me, I'm a perfectly functioning 23 year old but I just wish the hearing volume was a bit louder.

Reviews.Title: Good until.....
Reviews.Author: Workflow7
Reviews.Content: This phone was bought with two purposes in mind. First and foremost of course, to make and receive phone calls, and second to be used for infrequent text messaging.It started OK for like four days, then suddenly there started to be some kind of humming noise in the background that interfered with all calls made and received. We asked the callers if they heard the background noise but none of them did.  Considering it was a brand new phone and having failed in such a short period of time, I decided it was best to return it. Otherwise, it was a nice form factor and it weighed very little. Pity.

Reviews.Title: Samsung A737 Cellphone
Reviews.Author: Algohar
Reviews.Content: This is a good cellphone and this phone works overseas like south asian coutries.And did  not have any kind of receptions problems.

Reviews.Title: Great long lasting
Reviews.Author: N. Conrad
Reviews.Content: I got this phone when I signed up with AT&T; several years ago.  I've really loved it.  It's small and stylish and it does everything I want it to do.  I use it to make and receive calls, texts, go online and check all my email accounts.

Reviews.Title: Great little phone
Reviews.Author: Mark Garvey
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace the same model I'd lost a while back. In the interim, I'd had to shift to an LG model we had lying around, but I didn't care for it. I was glad to find this model Samsung was still available. As everyone else's mobiles keep getting bigger and more distracting, I love this dude for its compactness and functional simplicity. It handles calls and texts like a champ; that's a smart enough phone for me. My model was vended via Amazon by Unlocked Cell Phone Kings, in Miami, and their service was fast and trouble-free.

Reviews.Title: Cheap feeling
Reviews.Author: Pete Moss
Reviews.Content: Feels flimsy.  Buttons are pretty small and flat making it hard to text. Unintuitive menus always trying to take you online.  There are 4 menu options including the first one that require a data plan.  This is a cheap version of the Blast not a smartphone last I checked.

Reviews.Title: simple phone for a tight budget.
Reviews.Author: jeff h
Reviews.Content: Very good phone.  Had one of these before and like the simplicity of the phone.  It has web surfing also.  Only not a smart phone or a touch screen.

Reviews.Title: DEFECTIVE--- Back Cover Wouldn't Close
Reviews.Author: Charles Smith

} var node = cv_mo1DGDEZNCJWZT0preplay.parentNode; var cv_mo1DGDEZNCJWZT0currentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo1DGDEZNCJWZT0currentClick) { return cv_mo1DGDEZNCJWZT0currentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:28 MinsGot the phone via UPS and at first was impressed as it looked brand new. Came with charger, battery, instruction book. As per the instructions I removed the back cover to inspect the SIMS slot, tried to close the cover and the cover wouldn't align and "click" closed as instructed. The end of the phone, the cover was "ajar". Removed the cover again and carefully inspected the alignment points, the little "prongs" that should click in place just weren't catching the respective holes in the body of the phone. After trying several times, I concluded that this cover wasn't going to close and remain ajar which is unacceptable for practical use. I would have to "tape it down" somehow and this wasn't going to be a good long-term fix. I was very disappointed as I was confident that something made by SAMSUNG would be of a higher quality manufacture. The cover is plastic and quite thin, and I would be concerned that I'd break it or it would come apart while traveling. SEE PICTURES FOR MORE INFO.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, Flimsy looking, Low volume
Reviews.Author: Joey
Reviews.Content: Phone...Small and Flimsy like it would break in your handPhone volume...the volume is really low. Very crappy. The ringtone and call volume is sooo disappointingSamsung disappointed

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-band/3G slider phone in blue with brightly colorful screen and stereo Bluetooth music streaming
Fast music and video downloads and streams via AT&T; Mobile Music and Cellular Video
1.3-megapixel camera/camcorder; MicroSD expansion; IM via AIM, Windows Live and Yahoo!
Up to 3 hours of talk time, up to 250 hours (10+ days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung A737 QuadBand Unlocked Phone with 3G Support, 1.3 MP Camera and Stereo Bluetooth - Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - Red
